description: bird shaped body, lower half appears to have been pushed in with a chevron design impressed on it; upper half brown glazed, lower unglazed; thimble style cover; blue ring around filler base
text: Sikora chose this piece by her former undergraduate teacher at the Nova Scotia College of Art and Design, Sara Coote. Coote's interest in altering forms with great complexity and eccentricity greatly influenced Sikora's own work.
title: Covered Ewer
